feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [LIM1][Cooling System] - L107A04
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 13, 04:00 - 06:00 UTC

Aug 18, 22:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/09/2022 04:00 UTC
End time : 13/09/2022 06:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L107A04.

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

Aug 2, 22:32 UTC

entry.title: [RBX7][Vrack Network] - R713A08 - R713A15 - R713B18 - R713B21 - R716A14 - R716A17 - R716A09 - R713B05
entry.content:
Aug 18, 23:52 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/08/2022 21:35 UTC
End Time : 18/08/2022 23:40 UTC
Service impact : The Vrack network is now operational.
Root cause : Failure on a network equipment.

Aug 18, 23:36 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Aug 18, 23:11 UTC
Identified - Start time : 18/08/2022 21:35 UTC
Service impact : There is degradation on the Vrack network in the following racks : R713A08 ,R713A15, R713B18, R713B21, R716A14, R716A17, R716A09 - R713B05
Root cause : incident caused by failure and replacement of Network equipment.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working on a fix.

entry.title: [GRA1][Virtual Private Servers] - Automated backup
entry.content:
Aug 18, 13:56 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/08/2022 15:00 UTC
End Time : 17/08/2022 18:48 UTC
Service impact : The automated backup is available for vps 2018.
Backups between 15/08/2022 15:00 UTC and 17/08/2022 18:48 UTC could not be performed.

Aug 17, 18:48 UTC
Monitoring - The automated backup is available for vps 2018.
Our teams are monitoring the situation.

Aug 17, 18:38 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/08/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Automated backup is unavailable for vps 2018.
Meanwhile, vps 2020 are not impacted.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem

entry.title: [RBX4][Vrack Network] - 54A01 54A02 54B17 54B23 54B24 54B25 54B26
entry.content:

Resolved - Start Time : 18/08/2022 06:58 UTC
End Time : 18/08/2022 10:28 UTC
Root cause : Failure and replacement of Network equipment
Comment : vRack is available on all racks

Aug 18, 09:22 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 18/08/2022 06:58 UTC
Service impact : Vrack could have some degradation on the following racks 54A01 54A02 54B17 54B23 54B24 54B25 54B26
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working on a fix for this incident.
